item.title: Comment on Priorities by Fernando
item.dc:creator: Fernando
item.description: Hey Marvin I did not know this about you, but It was really important brotó know more about you and being open about it! I liked it, and definitely I can relate to it; i think everyone in this world could live the same way since no one is perfect right, but as the scripture in Hebrews 2:5-18 says Jesus is our example and he picked us bro, especially you who will bring help to those who feel tempted by sin and the devil. Great article Marvin keep writing you can accomplish something here.
item.content:encoded: Hey Marvin I did not know this about you, but It was really important brotó know more about you and being open about it! I liked it, and definitely I can relate to it; i think everyone in this world could live the same way since no one is perfect right, but as the scripture in Hebrews 2:5-18 says Jesus is our example and he picked us bro, especially you who will bring help to those who feel tempted by sin and the devil. Great article Marvin keep writing you can accomplish something here.

item.title: Comment on Priorities by Talishia Rosy Burton
item.dc:creator: Talishia Rosy Burton
item.description: To over come my depression, so I can deepen my compassion for the lost including my mother. Thank you bro. This was definitely worth reading.
item.content:encoded: To over come my depression, so I can deepen my compassion for the lost including my mother. Thank you bro. This was definitely worth reading.

item.title: Comment on Being Faithful by Rahab2
item.dc:creator: Rahab2
item.description: Great post! I really enjoyed it and wonder when in history people dropped "Disciple" for "Christian" completely.
item.content:encoded: Great post! I really enjoyed it and wonder when in history people dropped “Disciple” for “Christian” completely.
